songs.title: NDA
songs.lyrics:
[Hook: Nasty C]
I like my broads, commando
With the sauce, I'm Nandos
I'm ice cold, my chain refrigerated
Yeah, big links on me like we in the 80's
Big bitches, titty game on 50 babies
Big trips they know I'm a gifted baby
Big trips, I got me a bitch in Spain
Money talk like rappers, money spitting game

[Verse 1: Nasty C]
I got sued, 100 bands, Lord knows I was cross
Fuck it then, I bounced back, and worked around the loss
All my girls are 10's, yeah they round it off
They know not to make a sound when they around the boss
New wrist alert, new bitch alert
She ask what I am to her, new dick alert
New dick alert, new dick alert
R.I.P. that pussy had to spill some booze in the dirt
Half a bar on that wrist, I got time to spend
I got bands, I got notes, it's a choir nigga
You's a liar nigga
You ain't got bands, your office know I'm the man
And I'm never suit and tied up nigga
My baby please, don't stress me about money
Your loyalty's with the cheese, you were never ride or die innit?
Boy, how these bitches could leave a nigga anemic
Blood sucking hoes, you will never parasite a nigga

[Hook: Nasty C]
I like my broads, commando
With the sauce, I'm Nandos
I'm ice cold, my chain refrigerated
Yeah, big links on me like we in the 80's
Big bitches, titty game on 50 babies
Big trips they know I'm a gifted baby
Big trips, I got me a bitch in Spain
Money talk like rappers, money spitting game

[Verse 2: Nasty C]
Rolex flex, flex
Rolex flex, flex
Diamonds on me wet, wet, Dr Lex flex, flex
My new thotty is foreign, skin color was orange
Her behind is enormous, our relationship is cordless
You put some gas in that car, okay
I put some gas in that raw, smoke it
She is bad as a dog, ass of a horse
But I'm never smashing her raw, no way
I'm clique, I'm suited
Take a pic, I'm Buddha
Watch her lick, my jewellery
Dance like Chris Sharp
Nigga rolling blunt spliffs
I got Teddy with me, I got Viny with me
I got Marcus with me, I got Phillip with me
I got Tella with me, I got Eric with me
We only got this shit fucked up, you a'int never seen

[Hook: Nasty C]
I like my broads, commando
With the sauce, I'm Nandos
I'm ice cold, my chain refrigerated
Yeah, big links on me like we in the 80's
Big bitches, titty game on 50 babies
Big trips they know I'm a gifted baby
Big trips, I got me a bitch in Spain
Money talk like rappers, money spitting game
